name: China Survival
description:
China is an exciting RPG game in which you travel through different cultural aspects of China.

You are George, who travels through China. Entering in a lobby, you can choose out of four worlds: three tensive minigames, each one consisting of one cultural aspect of China, and one RPG map where you encounter people with problems: either the deadly smog that is present, or the suspicious and mysterious "monastery", or... You, George, have to help as much people with problems as possible, but you also have to watch out for any problems during your time in China!

The game is made for a school project. There will be no further extension of the game.
